Content:: Sujith Sanjaya Perera is a Sri Lankan politician and a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. He was elected from Kegalle District in 2015. He is a Member of the United National Party.[1][2] He is the son of Vincent Perera.[3] He was educated at Nalanda College, Colombo[4]  This article about a politician from Sabaragamuwa Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
